item.title: 勃肯鞋季度营收未达预期，消费者削减非必需品开支
item.description: 勃肯鞋周四公布的季度营收未达华尔街预期，因消费者谨慎消费及部分地区需求不均衡拖累了整体销售。【原文：Birkenstock missed Wall Street expectations for first-quarter revenue on Thursday, as cautious consumers and uneven demand in some regions weighed on overall sales.】

item.title: 独家：中国买家抢购美国高粱、澳大利亚大麦，国内玉米供应趋紧
item.description: 贸易消息人士称，近几个月中国买家大幅增加了饲料谷物采购量，在雨水损害国内玉米收成后，大量购入澳大利亚大麦和美国高粱。【原文：Chinese buyers have ramped up feed grain purchases in recent months, taking large volumes of Australian barley and U.S. sorghum after rain damaged the domestic corn harvest, trade sources said.】

item.title: 字节跳动新AI视频模型引发热潮，中国寻求再现"深度搜索"奇迹
item.description: 字节跳动的新视频生成人工智能模型已赢得埃隆·马斯克等人的赞赏，在中国引发热议。该模型被比作DeepSeek，因仅需少量提示就能生成电影级剧情而广受好评。【原文：ByteDance's new video-generating artificial intelligence model has already impressed the likes of Elon Musk and gone viral in China, where it has been compared to DeepSeek and won praise for its ability to produce cinematic storylines with just a few prompts.】

item.title: 与特朗普有关联的世界自由金融公司将推出外汇汇款平台
item.description: 由美国总统唐纳德·特朗普家族支持的加密货币企业World Liberty Financial周四宣布，计划推出一款新的外汇与汇款平台，提供简化服务并降低手续费。【原文：World Liberty Financial, a crypto venture backed by the family of U.S. President Donald Trump, said on Thursday it plans to roll out a new foreign exchange and remittance platform, offering simplified services with lower fees.】

item.title: 赛诺菲新任首席执行官贝伦·加里霍是谁？
item.description: 法国制药巨头赛诺菲周四任命贝伦·加里霍为新任首席执行官，此前该公司决定不再续聘保罗·赫德森的任期。【原文：French drugmaker Sanofi on Thursday appointed Belén Garijo as its new chief executive after choosing not to renew the mandate of Paul Hudson.】

item.title: 美国在亚太经合组织会议上推动人工智能资金和渔业技术，以应对与中国竞争
item.description: 特朗普政府本周在中国南部举行的亚太经合组织（APEC）会议上大力推广人工智能出口和海上监控技术，华盛顿正试图以此对抗北京的技术和海上影响力。【原文：The Trump administration is promoting artificial intelligence exports and maritime surveillance technology at Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) meetings in southern China this week, as Washington seeks to counter Beijing’s technological and maritime influence.】

item.title: 日产季度营业利润暴跌44%
item.description: 日产汽车周四公布，第三季度营业利润暴跌44%，至175亿日元（约合1.1437亿美元）。这家陷入困境的日本汽车制造商在美国和中国等市场面临激烈竞争。【原文：Nissan Motor reported a 44% fall in third-quarter operating profit to 17.5 billion yen ($114.37 million) on Thursday, as the struggling Japanese automaker faced heavy competition in markets such as the U.S. and China.】

item.title: 中国对电动汽车制造商与欧盟单独谈判的态度有所软化
item.description: 中国商务部发言人周四表示，中方期待更多中国电动汽车制造商与欧盟达成最低价格协议，此番表态缓和了此前对企业单独与欧盟谈判的批评态度。【原文：China looks forward to more of its EV makers reaching agreements on minimum prices with the European Union, a Chinese commerce ministry spokesperson said on Thursday, softening its previous criticism of firms negotiating with the bloc individually.】

item.title: Adyen报告2025年下半年营收增长21%
item.description: 荷兰支付处理商Adyen周四公布，2025年下半年净收入达12.7亿欧元（约合15.1亿美元），按固定汇率计算同比增长21%。这一业绩为其强劲增长的一年画上句号——该公司不仅超越了陷入困境的欧洲竞争对手，更巩固了其在与美国巨头PayPal和Stripe竞争中的地位。【原文：Dutch payments processor Adyen reported net revenue of 1.27 billion euros ($1.51 billion) for the second half of 2025 on Thursday, up 21% on a constant currency basis, capping a year of robust growth that saw it outpace struggling European rivals and solidify its position against U.S. giants PayPal and Stripe.】

item.title: 英国选择汇丰银行作为其数字债券试点发行的平台提供商
item.description: 英国已选定汇丰银行的区块链平台运行该国代币化或数字化政府债券的试点发行，该银行周四表示。此举使英国在探索基于区块链的主权债务方面领先于其他七国集团成员国。【原文：The UK has chosen HSBC's blockchain platform to run the country's pilot issuance of tokenised or digital government bonds, the bank said on Thursday, a move that puts Britain ahead of its G7 peers in exploring blockchain-based sovereign debt.】

item.title: 百达资本将以66亿美元价格向黑石集团、EQT出售废物管理公司Urbaser
item.description: 私营股权公司Platinum Equity周四在一份声明中表示，已同意以66亿美元的价格将西班牙废物管理公司Urbaser出售给黑石集团和EQT。【原文：Privately-held Platinum Equity has agreed to sell Spanish waste management company Urbaser to Blackstone and EQT for $6.6 billion, the company said in a statement on Thursday.】

item.title: 爱马仕首席执行官称爱泼斯坦是金融掠夺者，认为他是"目标"
item.description: 爱马仕首席执行官阿克塞尔·杜马斯表示，他多次拒绝杰弗里·爱泼斯坦的会面请求。【原文：Hermes CEO Axel Dumas said he resisted multiple attempts by Jeffrey Epstein to meet with him.】

item.title: 中国联想警告内存短缺将对个人电脑出货量构成压力
item.description: 中国联想集团周四警告称，随着内存芯片短缺问题持续恶化，个人电脑出货量正面临日益增大的压力。【原文：China's Lenovo Group warned on Thursday about mounting pressure on PC shipments as a worsening memory-chip shortage grips the industry.】

item.title: 瑞穗银行高管称日本央行最早可能在3月加息，2026年或加息三次
item.description: 日本瑞穗金融集团市场主管周四向路透社表示，鉴于通胀持续和日元疲软，日本央行最早可能在3月再次上调关键利率，今年可能加息多达三次。【原文：The Bank of Japan could raise key interest rates again as early as March and deliver up to three hikes this year in light of persistent inflation and yen weakness, Mizuho Financial Group's markets chief told Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 美能冰淇淋公布全年净利润下滑，这是其从联合利华冰淇淋业务分拆后首次发布业绩报告
item.description: 美能冰淇淋公司周四公布全年净利润暴跌48.4%，主要受分拆、重组及财务成本拖累。该公司已完成从联合利华分拆的程序，将于12月独立上市。【原文：The Magnum Ice Cream Company reported a 48.4% drop in full-year net profit on Thursday, driven by separation, restructuring and finance costs as the company finalised its spinoff from Unilever to list in December.】

item.title: 纽文同意以135亿美元收购施罗德
item.description: 美国资产管理公司纽文周四宣布，已同意以99亿英镑（约合135亿美元）收购英国公司施罗德，由此组建的集团管理资产规模将接近2.5万亿美元。【原文：U.S. asset manager Nuveen has agreed to buy British firm Schroders for 9.9 billion pounds ($13.5 billion), the companies said on Thursday, creating a group with combined assets under management of nearly $2.5 trillion.】

item.title: 多芬制造商联合利华季度销售额超预期，但警告市场增速放缓
item.description: 联合利华周四公布的第四季度核心销售额增长超出市场预期，主要得益于多芬和凡士林等品牌需求强劲，但该公司警告称，市场增速放缓可能影响今年的增长。【原文：Unilever's fourth-quarter underlying sales growth beat market expectations on Thursday, driven by a strong demand for brands such as Dove and Vaseline, although it warned that slowing markets could hurt growth this year.】

item.title: BAT年度利润增长，Velo在美国市场份额提升
item.description: 英美烟草公司周四公布，其年度利润增长2.3%，达到112.8亿英镑（合153.6亿美元）。该公司旗下Velo尼古丁袋产品市场份额扩大，新型电子烟和加热烟草产品的销售额也实现增长。【原文：Lucky Strike maker British American Tobacco on Thursday reported a 2.3% rise in annual profit to 11.28 billion pounds ($15.36 billion), as its Velo nicotine pouch gained market share and sales of its newer vapes and heated tobacco products grew.】

item.title: 爱马仕第四季度营收增长9.8%，超出预期
item.description: 爱马仕周四公布季度财报，在美日市场强劲销售的推动下，集团收入实现稳步增长。今年该集团略微放缓了提价步伐，其手袋售价仍维持在1万美元以上。【原文：Hermes, which sells handbags for $10,000 and more, on Thursday reported another quarter of steady revenue growth, lifted by strong sales in the United States and Japan, as the group slightly reduces the pace of price hikes this year.】

item.title: 赛诺菲任命贝伦·加里霍为新任首席执行官，此前公司决定不再续聘哈德森的任期。
item.description: 法国制药巨头赛诺菲周四宣布，任命贝伦·加里霍为新任首席执行官，此前公司决定不再续聘现任首席执行官保罗·哈德森。【原文：French drugmaker Sanofi said on Thursday it had appointed Belén Garijo as its new chief executive after deciding not to renew the mandate of current CEO Paul Hudson.】

item.title: 软银集团季度利润达16亿美元，得益于OpenAI的收益
item.description: 日本软银集团周四表示，受其对OpenAI投资估值上升的推动，10月至12月季度实现净利润2486亿日元（约合16.2亿美元）。【原文：Japan's SoftBank Group said on Thursday it logged a net profit of 248.6 billion yen ($1.62 billion) in the October-December quarter, boosted by the rising valuation of its investment in OpenAI.】

item.title: 乐瑞押注数据中心增长，上调盈利目标
item.description: 法国电气与数字建筑基础设施集团乐朗周四表示，强劲的数据中心需求正助力其业务扩张，并推动中期盈利目标小幅上调。【原文：French electrical and digital building infrastructure group Legrand on Thursday said strong data centre demand was helping its expansion, supporting a slight increase in its medium-term profitability targets.】

item.title: 深寻事件震动一年后，中国低成本AI模型即将迎来爆发式增长
item.description: 中国初创企业DeepSeek以低成本人工智能模型震撼全球科技界一年后，其国内竞争对手已做好更充分的准备，纷纷推出新模型与其抗衡，其中部分模型在设计上更具消费者吸引力。【原文：One year after Chinese startup DeepSeek rattled the global tech industry with the release of a low-cost artificial intelligence model, its domestic rivals are better prepared, vying with it to launch new models, some designed with more consumer appeal.】

item.title: 三星电子表示已向客户出货HBM4芯片
item.description: Samsung Electronics said on Thursday that it has begun shipping its latest high-bandwidth memory chips, known as HBM4, to customers as the South Korean chipmaker seeks to catch up with rivals in the race to supply the semiconductor crucial for Nvidia's AI chipsets.

item.title: 百威英博第四季度业绩超出多项预期，2026年体育赛事将带来提振
item.description: 全球最大啤酒生产商安海斯-布希英博周四公布的第四季度利润、营收和销量均超出预期，并表示在啤酒行业面临严峻挑战的背景下，公司2026年的利润增速有望超越主要竞争对手。【原文：Top brewer Anheuser-Busch InBev beat forecasts for fourth-quarter profits, revenues and volumes on Thursday and said it could grow profits at a faster rate than its main rivals in 2026 in a tough environment for beer.】

item.title: 蒂森克虏伯钢铁部门计提4.77亿美元重组费用
item.description: 蒂森克虏伯周四宣布将拨出4.01亿欧元（约合4.77亿美元）用于其钢铁部门的大规模裁员计划。与此同时，这家德国工业集团正就出售该业务与印度金达尔钢铁公司持续进行谈判。【原文：Thyssenkrupp on Thursday unveiled 401 million euros ($477 million) in expenses to fund far-reaching job cuts at its steel division, as the German industrial conglomerate continues talks with India's Jindal Steel over a sale of the business.】

item.title: 西门子上调全年盈利预期，此前其第一季度业绩超出市场预期
item.description: 西门子周四上调全年盈利预期，这家工程集团公布的2026财年第一季度业绩好于预期。【原文：Siemens raised its full-year profit outlook on Thursday as the engineering group reported better-than-expected results during the first quarter of its 2026 fiscal year.】

item.title: 梅赛德斯2025年利润因关税冲击和中国市场困境而腰斩
item.description: 梅赛德斯-奔驰周四公布的2025年营业利润骤降57%，降幅超出预期，凸显出该公司面临严峻挑战的一年——其在中国市场遭遇激烈竞争，同时承受高昂关税和负面汇率影响的双重压力。【原文：Mercedes-Benz reported a sharper-than-expected 57% drop in 2025 operating profit on Thursday, underscoring a difficult year as it battles stiff competition in China, costly tariffs and negative currency effects.】

item.title: 早盘要闻：就业数据已成过去，下看企业盈利
item.description: 安库尔·班纳吉带您展望欧洲及全球市场今日走势【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 丰田集团旗下企业延长丰田工业收购要约以提高收购成功率
item.description: 丰田汽车旗下子公司周四表示，将延长对叉车制造商丰田工业的收购要约期限至3月2日，以提高收购成功的可能性。【原文：A group company of Toyota Motor said on Thursday that the tender offer period for its buyout of forklift maker Toyota Industries will be extended until March 2 to increase the chances of the bid succeeding.】
